column4: Spinning 360 degrees provides a 3-second buff that gives the next shot a 1.5x damage multiplier. The buff stacks if the player spins multiple times.

column3: Escape Rope,Heart Holster,Table Tech Sight,Hip Holster
column4: Colt 1851 fires three tight spreads of three free bullets upon reloading. These projectiles ignore tables when fired from behind them.

column3: Ruby Bracelet,Drum Clip,Gilded Bullets,Platinum Bullets,Melted Rock,Heavy Bullets
column4: Face Melter fires two parallel columns of notes, shoots a guitar pick with a chance to stun upon reloading, and changes appearance to that of a Dean Z Blue Burst guitar.
A.W.P.'s color changes to orange and white, its shots freeze enemies, and it deals 62.5% more damage.

column3: Copper Ammolet,Ring of Fire Resistance,Ruby Bracelet
column4: Touching enemies sets them on fire.
Shock Rifle slowly regenerates ammo over time.
Bombs periodically spawn and orbit the player, exploding and dealing 40 damage upon touching an enemy.
Doubles the size of Bee Hive's bees and increases their damage by 25%, but decreases Bee Hive's rate of fire by 34%.
Corsair gains a black flag, and every Corsair shot will periodically fire two bouncing cannonballs perpendicular to itself as it travels.
Kruller Glaive's damage is increased by 20%, enemies hit will visually bleed, and jammed enemies will revert to normal on hit.

column3: +1 Bullets,Bullet Time,Amulet of the Pit Lord
column4: Blue Guon Stone's size and rotation speed is increased. If Blue Guon Stone blocks a bullet, it deals 15 damage to all nearby enemies.
While Siren is held, spawns a fish companion which shows what items are inside chests without opening them.

Using Elder Blank while having The Kiln or Luxin Cannon selected gives one Glass Guon Stone to the player, up to a maximum of four. This limit can be worked around by dropping excess glass guon stones on the floor before using the Elder Blank, and then collecting them again.
Cactus has a chance to shoot out a prickly pear that bounces off walls and shoots needles all around.

column3: Shotgun Full of Hate,Nail Gun,Armor of Thorns,Eyepatch
column4: Casey becomes spiked and fires a spread of 6 nails each time it is swung.
Gives Big Iron transmogrification effects and replaces each bullet with one from Bundle of Wands, Witch Pistol, and Hexagun.
Bullet Bore fires 2 drills per shot instead of the usual 1.

column3: Bundle of Wands,Hexagun,Witch Pistol,Staff of Firepower
column4: Increases the chance for the guns to transmogrify enemies.
Alien Sidearm has a much larger magazine and cannot be charged, but becomes fully automatic and the final two shots in the magazine are fully-charged shots.
Grants immunity to poison, fire, and electricity. Shooting enemies while standing on fire or ice will burn or freeze them, respectively.
Alien Engine's sprite changes and the flame turns green, igniting enemies with green fire. Alien Engine also grants flight while held.
Doubles the chance for Zombie Bullets to refund missed shots for the guns.
The decoy will turn into a charmed enemy.
Increases the damage of the guns by 50%.

column3: Lodestone Ammolet,Chaos Ammolet,Gold Ammolet,Uranium Ammolet,Copper Ammolet,Frost Ammolet
column4: Destroying small breakable objects (vases, barrels, etc.) has a small chance to activate a blank effect.
Increases the damage of both guns by 25%.
Kills with Proton Backpack spawn allied ghosts that attack enemies.

column3: Heart Lunchbox,Heart Locket,Heart Purse,Heart Bottle,Heart Holster
column4: Upon taking damage, spawns 3 Pulse Cannons that attack enemies.
Decreases the reload time of Trick Gun by 33% and increases fire rate by 20%.

column3: Master of Unlocking,Amulet of the Pit Lord,Springheel Boots,Copper Ammolet
column4: Flare Gun sets green fire, which leaves enemies permanently burning.

column3: Double Vision,Potion of Lead Skin,Shotga Cola,Shotgun Coffee,Old Knight's Flask,Potion of Gun Friendship
column4: Reloading will fire a glass bottle that will stun enemies it hits. Reloading while standing on a liquid replenishes the ammo missing in the current magazine, similar to Gungine.
Thompson Sub-Machinegun fires lasers. Each laser does 6.5 damage instead of the normal 5 damage.
Enables Bubble Lead mode which fires Bubble Blaster bubbles when uncharged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Enables Time Stopper mode, which fires a flash that stops time for a second and deals damage to all enemies on screen when fully charged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.
Ghosts from Gunslinger's Ashes are larger and can freeze enemies. Reload time decreased by 20%.

column3: Heck Blaster,Crown of Guns,Coin Crown,Gilded Bullets,Ring of Fire Resistance
column4: Gungeon Ant becomes an ant queen and shoots rocket ants.

column3: Pea Shooter,+1 Bullets,Amulet of the Pit Lord
column4: Chance for the Green Guon Stone to heal upon taking damage is raised to 70% if that damage would have killed the player. 20  also appears whenever Green Guon Stone heals the player.
Mahoguny fires four explosive shots at a time.
Decreases Anvillain's shot speed by 25% and increases damage by 20%.

column3: Ammo Belt,Drum Clip,Galactic Medal of Valor
column4: Hegemony Rifle bullets are replaced by piercing lasers.
Singularity spawns a hell portal that sucks enemies in and deals high damage.
Increases the damage of the guns against jammed enemies by 50%.This bonus stacks with the damage from Silver Bullets, for a total of 487.5% damage to jammed enemies.
A swarm of bees replaces enemy bullets when a table is flipped.
Flipping a table briefly stops time.
Trank Gun's fire rate is decreased, damage and reload time are increased, and its bullets will inflict slow and stun.
Significantly increases the size of the gun's shots, and increases the amount of damage they gain from Snowballets.
Freeze Ray freezes enemies much quicker.
Firing with any gun will periodically fire a Heart of Ice projectile that splits and bounces.
Big Iron fires a single high-damage slug.

column3: Blooper,Tangler,Regular Shotgun,Huntsman,Pulse Cannon,Void Shotgun,Blunderbuss,Zilla Shotgun,Elephant Gun,Siren,Old Goldie
column4: Increases damage and knockback by 20%, increases shot speed by 50%, and decreases reload time by 20%.
Decreases the reload time of MAC10 by 33%, increases its magazine size by 50%, and increases its knockback by 50%.
Shotgrub fires a wide spread of five bullets, which bounce back and split into waving bullets after hitting a wall, similar to the Shotgrub enemy's attack.
The split soul initially moves towards the player instead of away.
Abyssal Tentacle grabs two enemies at a time.
Dragunfire turns grey and has an increased rate of fire.
Lil' Bomber's bombs become gold and spawn  every time they hit an enemy.
Klobbe is doubled.
Composite Gun shots leave a trail of fire.
Laser Lotus gains the appearance of a flower. Its magazine size increases to 32, its maximum ammo increases to 250, its fire rate greatly increases, and it deals half damage.
Decreases M1's reload time by 20% and increases its magazine size, and maximum ammo. Increases movement speed. Changes appearance to resemble an M14.
Increases Makarov's maximum ammo by 30%. While holding Makarov, it occasionally fires a homing bullet at an enemy for free.
Significantly increases the size of Mass Shotgun's shots.
Each Master Round the player carries permanently unlocks the mode of its respective floor for Chamber Gun. Reloading the gun with a full magazine cycles through the unlocked modes.
Flame Hand becomes green and creates pools of green fire. Green fire does not damage the player, and enemies that touch green fire are permanently aflame.
If hit, Glass Guon Stone breaks, but Glass Cannon retains its ammo.
Nails deal triple damage.
Evolver evolves after every 3 unique enemy types killed instead of 5.
Rage duration is greatly increased if a table is flipped while Shotgun Full of Hate is held.
Mutation's beam turns blue and creates electrified water. The player is immune to electricity while Mutation is held.
Increases Vulcan Cannon's maximum ammo by 25% and significantly increases fire rate.
Buzzkill's saw blades are linked by lightning.
Luxin Cannon and its shots turn grey, and the lasers deal 25% more damage.
Orange Guon Stone grows in size, fires more frequently, and deals more damage.

column3: Ballot,Table Tech Sight,Table Tech Blanks,Table Tech Stun,Table Tech Money,Table Tech Rocket,Table Tech Rage
column4: The first shot after reloading Origuni fires three planes.
Plague Pistol bullets bounce and are connected with electricity.
The guns home in on enemies.

column4: Pea Shooter shots become larger, deal more damage, and explode.
Upon hitting an enemy 3 times with Light Gun, a dog appears and attacks that enemy.

column3: Gungeon Pepper,The Scrambler,Unfinished Gun,Napalm Strike,Copper Ammolet,Hot Lead,Weird Egg,Flame Hand
+1 Bullets,Amulet of the Pit Lord,Charmed Bow
column4: Enemies that damage the player become temporarily charmed.

column3: Nanomachines,Bionic Leg,Fortune's Favor,Shock Rounds,+1 Bullets,Laser Sight
column4: Machine Pistol shots gain the effect of Angry Bullets and are connected with electricity.
Pitchfork fires green fireballs, setting enemies permanently aflame.
Increases coolness by 2.
Prototype Railgun shots bounce up to 5 times.

column3: +1 Bullets,Amulet of the Pit Lord,Ring of Fire Resistance
column4: Red Guon Stone's size is increased. Player will gain a yellow glow and stat increase similar to that of Macho Brace for a short time whenever Red Guon Stone blocks a bullet.
Rolling reloads six bullets. Dodge roll distance is increased by 20% when the gun held.

column3: Lodestone Ammolet,Copper Ammolet,Chaos Ammolet,Gold Ammolet,Frost Ammolet,Uranium Ammolet
column4: After Relodestone's effect ends, the bullets that were absorbed are shot out of the player dealing damage to enemies.

column3: Mimic Tooth Necklace,Ruby Bracelet,Cog of Battle
column4: Hegemony Carbine shots light enemies on fire and bounce.
Shotbow fires 9 parallel arrows straight forward.

column3: Rocket-Powered Bullets,Air Strike,IBomb Companion App,Explosive Rounds
column4: Gunbow fires explosive missiles.
Doubles the spread of the guns, decreasing their accuracy.
Bombs home in on enemies.

Reduces reload times of the guns by 30%. Standing still for a short time (around 1â€“2 seconds) causes the player to glow yellow, increasing the damage of the guns by 50%. This effect persists until the player switches weapons or moves. Sniper Shells and Professionals are permanently charmed.

column3: Hexagun,Witch Pistol,Staff of Firepower,Bundle of Wands
column4: Makes the guns' shots bounce. Owl becomes skeletal in appearance and fires bouncing, letter-shaped bullets.
Molotovs create green fire pools. Green fire does not damage the player, and enemies that touch green fire are permanently aflame.
Increases Polaris ammo capacity to 700, increases its magazine size to 30, increases damage by 20%, increases fire rate when leveled up, and changes its appearance.
Increases the magazine size of the guns by 50%, increases the size of their projectiles, and allows them to bounce once.

column4: When reloading Teapot, a red aura appears around companions. Every enemy in this aura will be ignited.
Elephant Gun becomes an elephant head and shoots elephants instead of bullets.

column4: Pig fires bats and gains a green appearance.
While one of the guns is held, nails are periodically fired in all directions.

column3: Red Guon Stone,White Guon Stone,Blue Guon Stone,Green Guon Stone,Clear Guon Stone,Orange Guon Stone,Pink Guon Stone
column4: When the player fires Tetrominator, each Guon Stone has a chance to shoot a Tetromino corresponding to the type of Guon Stone.

column3: The Judge,Full Metal Jacket,Mass Shotgun,Bionic Leg,Deck4rd,Grasschopper
column4: Police Officer turns into a robot and becomes unkillable.

While holding either the Charmed Bow or Shotgun Full of Love, all shots fired by the player (even shots fired via items other than either gun) and any companions are guaranteed to charm enemies. In addition, the player is followed by a fairy that blocks bullets and displays the contents of chests.
Shots from the guns deal triple damage, are doubled in size, pierce enemies, and bounce off of obstacles.
Gives Mutation poison effect.
Patriot has a chance to transmogrify enemies into snakes.

column3: Flash Ray,Amulet of the Pit Lord,+1 Bullets
column4: Increases the size of White Guon Stone. If the player has Daruma, its cooldown is halved.
Magnum gains a bayonet that blocks bullets when reloading, similar to Huntsman.
Freeze Ray gains piercing and slowly regenerates ammo over time.
When Sunlight Javelin kills an enemy, it will spawn a circular zone that ignites all enemies within it.
